Reviews.Title: Kids Like It!
Reviews.Author: Frances Prater
Reviews.Content: I bought this one for my granddaughters. They like it but do fuss over how much time it takes to text and the size of the screen. They love the color and the feel.

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: Ibelis Manzano
Reviews.Content: It's a good phone. I'm happy I bought it. It was very good negotiation. Excellent to connect to social networks. Easy and convenient to handle. I like the color. I made very good buy.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Nazareth Hernandez
Reviews.Content: very good product, and the estimated transfer passed off without inconvenience. fully recommend buying through this company, very responsible ..

Reviews.Title: excellent product and seller
Reviews.Author: albert paez
Reviews.Content: is a great product, my cousin is very happy and me too, i could give something from hight quality from a good seller

Reviews.Title: Different cellphone :@
Reviews.Author: Juan Aponte (Venezuela)
Reviews.Content: I'm so angry because my girlfriend was waiting excited by her phone and When I recieved the item, It wasn't the phone that I had ordered. This was completely pink, very different to the picture in Amazon. My girlfriend didn't like it and I lost my money.

Reviews.Title: This is no a brand new phone,!!!!
Reviews.Author: Tomas L
Reviews.Content: This is not a brand new phone, i am ver disapoiment because it's a used phone. I think it's refubrised, because the interior of the phone its dirt a uncolorNot buyt untill youre sure it is a new phone

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Quad-band GSM cell phone compatible with 850/900/1800/1900 frequencies and GPRS/EDGE data capabilities
Slim, powerful Blackberry messaging phone with SureType hybrid numeric/QWERTY keypad; GPS for turn-by-turn navigation
Push email delivery from up to 10 email accounts (personal and corporate); 2.0-megapixel camera with video capture; MicroSD expansion; Bluetooth stereo music
Up to 3.5 hours of talk time, up to 240 hours (10 days) of standby time
ProductInfo.Name: BlackBerry Pearl 8110 PK Unlocked Phone with 2 MP Camera, GPS, MicroSD Slot, and Digital Media Player--US Version with Warranty (Pink)
